fields.name: static1
fields.label: intro.s1

aux.sampleValue:
Welcome to the Landlord Portal for the Stock return.

This is an online form designed to collate information on the projections of RSLs in Scotland.  An Annual Stock return must be submitted by the 31st May each year.

fields.text:
Welcome to the Landlord Portal for the Stock return.

This is an online form designed to collate information on the projections of RSLs in Scotland. An Annual Stock return must be submitted by the 31st May each year.

fields.name: static2
fields.label: intro.s2

aux.sampleValue:
The online Stock form has three sections:

* Stock by Provision
* Stock by Type, Apartment Size and Rent
* Approval

Each section is accessed via the menu on the left hand side of the screen.  Once in a section, you will be able to use the navigation buttons on the input screens to move between screens.

Every data entry field requires a value.  Blank fields are not permitted and will produce a validation error.

fields.text:
The online Stock form has three sections:

  • Stock by Provision
  • Stock by Type, Apartment Size and Rent
  • Approval

Each section is accessed via the menu on the left hand side of the screen. Once in a section, you will be able to use the navigation buttons on the input screens to move between screens.

Every data entry field requires a value. Blank fields are not permitted and will produce a validation error.

children.name: cn_totalscunitsowned
children.label: Total SC Units Owned
children.calculation: ( cn_generalneedssocialhousingscunitsowned + cn_shelteredhousingscunitsowned + cn_veryshelteredhousingscunitsowned + cn_shelteredwheelchairhousingscunitsowned + cn_amenityhousingscunitsowned + cn_communityalarmscunitsowned + cn_wheelchairhousingscunitsowned + cn_ambulantdisabledhousingscunitsowned + cn_otherspeciallyadaptedhousingscunitsowned )
children.tooltip:
Total SC Units Owned = 
General Needs Social Housing SC Units Owned +
Sheltered Housing SC Units Owned +
Very Sheltered Housing SC Units Owned +
Sheltered Wheelchair Housing SC Units Owned +
Amenity Housing SC Units Owned +
Community Alarm SC Units Owned +
Wheelchair Housing SC Units Owned +
Ambulant Disabled Housing SC Units Owned +
Other Specially Adapted Housing SC Units Owned

children.name: cn_totalscunitsleasedelsewhere
children.label: Total SC Units Leased Elsewhere
children.tooltip:
Total SC Units Leased Elsewhere = 
General Needs Social Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Sheltered Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Very Sheltered Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Sheltered Wheelchair Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Amenity Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Community Alarm SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Wheelchair Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Ambulant Disabled Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Other Specially Adapted Housing SC Units Leased Elsewhere

children.name: cn_totalscunits
children.label: Total SC Units
children.tooltip:
Total SC Units = 
General Needs Social Housing SC Total Units +
Sheltered Housing SC Total Units +
Very Sheltered Housing SC Total Units +
Sheltered Wheelchair Housing SC Total Units +
Amenity Housing SC Total Units +
Community Alarm SC Total Units +
Wheelchair Housing SC Total Units +
Ambulant Disabled Housing SC Total Units +
Other Specially Adapted Housing SC Total Units

children.name: cn_totalnscunitsowned
children.label: Total NSC Units Owned
children.calculation: ( cn_generalneedssocialhousingnscunitsowned + cn_shelteredhousingnscunitsowned + cn_veryshelteredhousingnscunitsowned + cn_shelteredwheelchairhousingnscunitsowned + cn_amenityhousingnscunitsowned + cn_communityalarmnscunitsowned + cn_wheelchairhousingnscunitsowned + cn_ambulantdisabledhousingnscunitsowned + cn_otherspeciallyadaptedhousingnscunitsowned )
children.tooltip:
Total NSC Units Owned = 
General Needs Social Housing NSC Units Owned +
Sheltered Housing NSC Units Owned +
Very Sheltered Housing NSC Units Owned +
Sheltered Wheelchair Housing NSC Units Owned +
Amenity Housing NSC Units Owned +
Community Alarm NSC Units Owned +
Wheelchair Housing NSC Units Owned +
Ambulant Disabled Housing NSC Units Owned +
Other Specially Adapted Housing NSC Units Owned

children.name: cn_totalnscunitsleasedelsewhere
children.label: Total NSC Units Leased Elsewhere
children.tooltip:
Total NSC Units Leased Elsewhere = 
General Needs Social Housing NSC Units Leased Elsewhere +

Very Sheltered Housing NSC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Sheltered Wheelchair Housing NSC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Amenity Housing NSC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Community Alarm NSC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Wheelchair Housing NSC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Ambulant Disabled Housing NSC Units Leased Elsewhere +
Other Specially Adapted Housing NSC Units Leased Elsewhere

children.name: cn_totalnscunits
children.label: Total NSC Units
children.tooltip:
Total NSC Units = 
General Needs Social Housing NSC Total Units +
Sheltered Housing NSC Total Units +
Very Sheltered Housing NSC Total Units +
Sheltered Wheelchair Housing NSC Total Units +
Amenity Housing NSC Total Units +
Community Alarm NSC Total Units +
Wheelchair Housing NSC Total Units +
Ambulant Disabled Housing NSC Total Units +
Other Specially Adapted Housing NSC Total Units

children.name: cn_totalnscbedsunitsowned
children.label: Total NSC Beds Owned
children.tooltip:
Total NSC Beds Owned = 
General Needs Social Housing NSC Beds Owned +
Sheltered Housing NSC Beds Owned +

Amenity Housing NSC Beds Owned +
Community Alarm NSC Beds Owned +
Wheelchair Housing NSC Beds Owned +
Ambulant Disabled Housing NSC Beds Owned +

children.name: cn_totalnscbedsunitsleasedelsewhere
children.label: Total NSC Beds Leased Elsewhere
children.tooltip:
Total NSC Beds Leased Elsewhere = 
General Needs Social Housing NSC Beds Leased Elsewhere +
Sheltered Housing NSC Beds Leased Elsewhere +

Amenity Housing NSC Beds Leased Elsewhere +
Community Alarm NSC Beds Leased Elsewhere +

Ambulant Disabled Housing NSC Beds Leased Elsewhere +

children.name: cn_totalnscbeds
children.label: Total NSC Beds
children.tooltip:
Total NSC Beds =

Wheelchair Housing NSC Total Beds +

fields.name: type_1
fields.label: Stock by Type, Apartment Size and Average Weekly Rent

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentsc1aptnooflettableunits
children.label: SC1 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units
children.validationMessage: Lettable 1 Apt SC units must be less than or equal to Total of all 1 Apt SC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentsc2aptnooflettableunits
children.label: SC2 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units
children.validationMessage: Lettable 2 Apt SC units must be less than or equal to Total of all 2 Apt SC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentsc3aptnooflettableunits
children.label: SC3 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units
children.validationMessage: Lettable 3 Apt SC units must be less thyan or equal to Total of all 3 Apt SC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypeaptsizerentsc4nooflettableunits
children.label: SC4 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units
children.validationMessage: Lettable 4 Apt SC units must be less than or equal to Total of all 4 Apt SC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypeaptsizerentsc5nooflettableunits
children.label: SC5+ Apt Nos. of Lettable Units
children.validationMessage: Lettable 5+ Apt SC units must be less than or equal to Total of all 5+ Apt SC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentsctotaltotal
children.label: SC Total
children.validationMessage: Total of all SC units by Apt. size must equal Total of all SC units by Provision Type
children.tooltip:
SC Total = 
SC! Apt Total +
SC2 Apt Total +
SC3 Apt Total +
SC4 Apt Total +
SC5+ Apt Total

children.name: cn_stkbytypeaptsizerentsctotallettableunits
children.label: SC Total Lettable Units
children.tooltip:
SC Total Lettable Units = 
SC! Apt Nos. of Lettable Units +
SC2 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units +
SC3 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units +
SC4 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units +
SC5+ Apt Nos. of Lettable Units +

children.name: cn_stkbytypeaptsizerentsctotalavgweeklyrent
children.label: SC Total Avg Weekly Rent
children.tooltip:
SC Total Avg Weekly Rent  = 
((SC1 Apt Avg Weekly Rent  * SC! Apt Nos. of Lettable Units) +
(SC2 Apt Avg Weekly Rent  * SC2 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units) +
(SC3 Apt Avg Weekly Rent  * SC3 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units) +
(SC4 Apt Avg Weekly Rent  * SC4 Apt Nos. of Lettable Units) +
(SC5+ Apt Avg Weekly Rent  * SC5+ Apt Nos. of Lettable Units))
 / SC Total Lettable Units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentnscunitsnooflettableuni
children.label: NSC Units Nos. of Lettable Units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentnscbedsnooflettableunit
children.label: NSC Beds Nos. of Lettable Unit
children.validationMessage: Lettable NSC beds must = 0 if Lettable NSC units = 0, otherwise Lettable NSC beds must be greater than or equal to Lettable NSC units

fields.name: type_3
fields.label: Stock in low demand, unlettable or used for temp accom

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentsctotallowdemand
children.label: SC Total Low Demand
children.validationMessage: Low demand SC units must be less than or equal to Total of all SC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentsctotalusedfortempaccom
children.label: SC Total Used for Temp Accom
children.validationMessage: Used for temp accom SC units must be less than or equal to Total of all SC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentnscunitslowdemand
children.label: NSC Units Low Demand Total
children.validationMessage: Low demand NSC units must be less than or equal to Total of all NSC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentnscunitsusedfortempacco
children.label: NSC Units Used for Temp Accom
children.validationMessage: Used for temp accom NSC units must be less than or equal to Total of all NSC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentnscbedslowdemand
children.label: NSC Beds Low Demand
children.validationMessage: Low demand NSC beds must = 0 if Low demand NSC units = 0, otherwise Low demand NSC beds must be greater than or equal to Low demand NSC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentnscbedsunlettable
children.label: NSC Beds Unlettable
children.validationMessage: Unlettable NSC beds must = 0 if Unlettable NSC units = 0, otherwise Unlettable NSC beds must be greater than or equal to Unlettable NSC units

children.name: cn_stkbytypesizerentnscbedsusedfortempaccom
children.label: NSC Beds Used for Temp Accom
children.validationMessage: Used for temp accom NSC beds must = 0 if Used for temp accom NSC units = 0, otherwise Used for temp accom NSC beds must be greater than or equal to Used for temp accom NSC units

fields.name: type_3
fields.label: Stock by age and dwelling type

children.name: cn_scownedpre1919total
children.label: Total
children.help:
SC Owned Pre-1919 Total =
SC Owned Pre-1919 House +
SC Owned Pre-1919 High Rise +
SC Owned Pre-1919 Tenement +
SC Owned Pre-1919 4 in a Block +
SC Owned Pre-1919 Other Flat / Maisonette

children.name: cn_scowned19191944total
children.label: Total
children.help:
SC Owned 1919-1944 Total =
SC Owned 1919-1944 House +
SC Owned 1919-1944 High Rise +
SC Owned 1919-1944 Tenement +
SC Owned 1919-1944 4 in a Block +
SC Owned 1919-1944 Other Flat / Maisonette

children.name: cn_scowned19451964total
children.label: Total
children.help:
SC Owned 1945-1964 Total =
SC Owned 1945-1964 House +
SC Owned 1945-1964 High Rise +
SC Owned 1945-1964 Tenement +
SC Owned 1945-1964 4 in a Block +
SC Owned 1945-1964 Other Flat / Maisonette

children.name: cn_scowned19651982total
children.label: Total
children.help:
SC Owned 1965-1982 Total =
SC Owned 1965-1982 House +
SC Owned 1965-1982 High Rise +
SC Owned 1965-1982 Tenement +
SC Owned 1965-1982 4 in a Block +
SC Owned 1965-1982 Other Flat / Maisonette

children.name: cn_scownedpost1982total
children.label: Total
children.help:
SC Owned Post-1982 Total =
SC Owned Post-1982 House +
SC Owned Post-1982 High Rise +
SC Owned Post-1982 Tenement +
SC Owned Post-1982 4 in a Block +
SC Owned Post-1982 Other Flat / Maisonette

children.name: cn_scownedtotalhouse
children.label: House
children.tooltip:
SC Owned Total House = 
SC Owned Pre-1919 House +
SC Owned 1919-1944 House +
SC Owned 1945-1964 House +
SC Owned 1965-1982 House +
SC Owned Post-1982 House

children.name: cn_scownedtotalhighrise
children.label: High Rise
children.tooltip:
SC Owned Total High Rise = 
SC Owned Pre-1919 High Rise +
SC Owned 1919-1944 High Rise +
SC Owned 1945-1964 High Rise +
SC Owned 1965-1982 High Rise +
SC Owned Post-1982 High Rise

children.name: cn_scownedtotaltenement
children.label: Tenement
children.tooltip:
SC Owned Total Tenement = 
SC Owned Pre-1919 Tenement +
SC Owned 1919-1944 Tenement +
SC Owned 1945-1964 Tenement +
SC Owned 1965-1982 Tenement +
SC Owned Post-1982 Tenement

children.name: cn_scownedtotal4inablock
children.label: 4 in a Block
children.tooltip:
SC Owned Total 4 in a Block = 
SC Owned Pre-1919 4 in a Block +
SC Owned 1919-1944 4 in a Block +
SC Owned 1945-1964 4 in a Block +
SC Owned 1965-1982 4 in a Block +
SC Owned Post-1982 4 in a Block

children.name: cn_scownedtotalotherflatmaisonette
children.label: Other Flat / Maisonette
children.tooltip:
SC Owned Total Other Flat / Maisonette = 
SC Owned Pre-1919 Other Flat / Maisonette +
SC Owned 1919-1944 Other Flat / Maisonette +
SC Owned 1945-1964 Other Flat / Maisonette +
SC Owned 1965-1982 Other Flat / Maisonette +
SC Owned Post-1982 Other Flat / Maisonette

children.name: cn_totalscowned
children.label: Total SC Owned
children.validationMessage: Total of all SC units by Apt. size must equal Total of all SC units by Age band
children.tooltip:
SC Owned Total Total SC Owned = 
SC Owned Pre-1919 Total +
SC Owned 1919-1944 Total +
SC Owned 1945-1964 Total +
SC Owned 1965-1982 Total +
SC Owned Post-1982 Total

fields.name: type_3
fields.label: Stock partly owned and non-housing units

pages.title: Stock by Type, Apartment Size and Rent

fields.label: F1.7 ProvisionUpdateasatDate
fields.validationMessage: Date approved cannot be a date in the future.
